text:
Yet another case of
our brethren from Redmond ignoring the rules that they established. Gee, you'd
think we'd be used to that by now. :frowning_face: -- There are 10 kinds of people in the
world... those who understand binary and those who don't. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
metadata.email_text_original:
[You don't often get email from melvin.backus@byers.com. Learn why this is
important at https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification ] Yet another case of
our brethren from Redmond ignoring the rules that they established. Gee, you'd
think we'd be used to that by now. ☹ -- There are 10 kinds of people in the
world... those who understand binary and those who don't. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
-----Original Message----- From: 'Susan Bradley' via PatchManagement Sent:
Wednesday, January 10, 2024 4:06 PM To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com;
patchmanagement@googlegroups.com Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] You may hit a
0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE So here's something interesting
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Ftopic%2Fkb5034441-windows-recovery-environment-update-for-windows-10-version-21h2-and-22h2-january-9-2024-62c04204-aaa5-4fee-a02a-2fdea17075a8&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C314077bbc3684032674a08dc122609e9%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638405202786810244%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C62000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=HYtYf9noR0w7Q4Mm9it2f2vEy64ybp%2F1cJRguCSgOd8%3D&reserved=0
It's called a security update but unless you sync the "update" section it's not
on WSUS. WSUS classification Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) and Microsoft
Endpoint Configuration Manager Yes This update will automatically sync with WSUS
if you configure Products and Classifications as follows: Product: Windows 10,
version 1903 and later Classification: Updates
Link: None
